short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Write Google PPC performance reports in a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Writing PPC reports/commentaries for your clients is time-consuming and a poor use of your expertise. Generate weekly and monthly client reports in under a minute.
